CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. MEAD CORPORATION
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENT L. JONES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF J. PETER COLL, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KENT L. JONES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:00 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
